data.title: Student Engagement & Leadership
data.text:
USFC chapters focus on and uphold their values pertaining to diversity, unity, scholastic achievement, political awareness, and service. Fraternities and sororities in USFC provide a sense of community and belonging through a variety of events and programs tailored for academic success, personal growth and self-discovery, leadership, and mentorship. All chapters in our council function with the intent and goal to give back to our communities.

For more information visit ucsbusfc.org

The Professional Fraternity Council (PFC) at UCSB exists to promote fellowship among professionally minded students from all majors and in various professional fraternities by hosting events aimed to improve professionalism, serve the community, and provide networking opportunities. Its member organizations provide a pre-professional experience for their members with professional focuses spanning a wide variety of fields and interests.

For more information visit ucsbpfc.org

NPHC has the purpose and mission of achieving “Unanimity of thought and action as far as possible in the conduct of Greek letter collegiate fraternities and sororities, and to consider problems of mutual interest to its member organizations.” Since its foundation, NPHC has continued to provide a voice for the African-American community.

For more information or to get in touch with an organization reach out to greeklife@sa.ucsb.edu

The hundreds of members across the chapters represented by IFC at UC Santa Barbara are brought together by a shared commitment to community engagement and betterment. Through a focus on philanthropy, professional development, and a commitment to academics, our chapters strive to offer their members the opportunities to make the most of their collegiate experience.

For more information visit ucsbifc.org

The Panhellenic Council at UCSB is proud to represent the outstanding Panhellenic chapters on our campus. Our chapters are filled with unique, diverse, and accomplished people who are determined to make a lasting impact. Each chapter is dedicated to providing opportunities for friendship, academic support, community service, leadership, personal growth, and more.

For more information visit ucsbpanhellenic.org
